Name: Bonaparte
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of orange slice wheel.
POUR chilled soda water into an ice-filled glass.
ADD freshly brewed hot espresso coffee so it layers on the sparkling water.
Lastly, POUR the mandarin liqueur (the tasty part of the Bonaparte), which will sink through the coffee layer, pulling the drink together while leaving the coffee's crema on the surface.
Review: Zesty mandarin orange and espresso coffee served as a tall, refreshing cocktail. A tall drink named after a short man!
History: Created 20th February 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Bonaparte contains 143 calories
